page.title: 12HOUSES
page.content: Housing in this area varies from large manor house style through semidetached to terraced dwellings.The four larger houses standing in their own grounds make an attractive feature. Fifteen farmhouses are scattered over the landscape. Some are owner occupied others have tenant farmers. Two of the houses have been built this century others much earlier. Detached houses generally have four or more upper rooms and two bathrooms or one bathroom and a shower room. Some have an annexe or flat in the grounds to accommodate relatives in need of help. Most of the other houses are three bedroomed semi-detached some of which are council owned.
